::DarkMouse::

She reached the end of the ladder and transformed into mouse mode and 
used her night vision.  She followed Quickstrike.  She said with a 
little fear in her voice," Tarantulas?  He's back?"  She reachede out 
to stop Quickstrike for a moment."Uh Quickstrike, he doesn't like me. 
I know, I'm nothing but a mouse meal to him."  She shook a little 
from fear.  She had remembered when that spider had tried to kill 
her.  And on several counts had he tried to kill her.  She suddered 
and stayed very close to Quickstrike. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Quickstrike made it down from the ladder and looked around. It was 
nearly 
> pitch black. "It's th' bunker where Black Arachnia and Tarantulas 
suppose t' 
> be," he replied to Dark Mouse. He actived his infra-red vision.
> 
> "Sugar-bot? Tarantulas? Ya here?" he called out.
>
